event_text: m_c notices bamboo growing in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest!

r_c has a wonderful idea for decorating m_c's nest! m_c wakes up in the middle of the night with bamboo brushing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face. Despite the slight spook it gave m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/mew/mews} to r_c in the morning a thank you for the cool surprise!
m_c eyes a pink-nosed rat that wandered into the elder's den. Before r_c can even think about stopping {PRONOUN/m_c/object}, m_c befriends the weird little thing with a few leftover acorns.
m_c grins toothily at a acc_singular that wandered into camp! Instead of diving toward it like anyone would expect a cat to do, m_c decides to befriend it with seeds and nuts.

r_c's eyes dilate as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/hunch/hunches} down to watch a acc_singular nibble at a fat seed! m_c stops r_c before {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} pounce, and manages to.. befriend the acc_singular! r_c rolls {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} eyes, grumbling about wasted food.
m_c comes into camp with a happy glint in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eye, happily sharing how m_c managed to keep a snail as {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pet.
r_c and m_c go on a walk together! After a while, m_c and r_c run into a cute, slowly moving snail! m_c decides to keep it as a pet, and r_c coos at the little thing as m_c carries it home.
m_c comes into camp with a happy glint in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eye, and a dangling worm in their jaws...!?
r_c and m_c go on a walk together! After a while, m_c and r_c run into a light pink, squirmy little worm! m_c decides to keep it as a pet, and r_c coos at the little thing as m_c carries it home.
